sentences.sContent: Something’s been niggling her all day.
sentences.sCn: 有什么事烦了她一整天。

sentences.sContent: It niggles me that we can’t go home yet and get warm.
sentences.sCn: 我很生气，我们到现在还不能回家暖和暖和。

synos.tran: 拘泥小节；为琐事费时；挑剔

words.tran: 为琐事操心的；过于精细的；琐碎的
过于琐碎的工作；无关紧要的事

trans.tranCn: 拘泥小节； 挑剔， 吹毛求疵； 为小事操心； 不断地烦扰
trans.tranOther: if something niggles you, you keep worrying about it or feeling annoyed about it and you cannot forget it
